LanguageData.RWC_TooClose: 他の建築物が近すぎます! いくつかの方向が塞がれています.
LanguageData.RWC_ActiveDesc: Sets whether the side is active and ready to detonate.
LanguageData.RWC_SafetyDesc: Toggle the safety. When on, it will not detonate if any player structure is in the radius.\nWhen off, it will detonate no matter what.
LanguageData.RWC_ObstructedDesc: Toggle the obstruction overlay. When on, it will display red X's on any structure within the direction's radius. Otherwise it will be hidden.
